title: Last Train to Jubilee Bay
description: After the sickness and quarantine almost destroyed the city, the traders arrived creeping out from the sea to live off the memories of those people left behind; getting them addicted to the serum these strange creatures manufacture in return. But now itâ€™s been more than five days since they have come for their daily visit. And Lucy is determined to find out why.At the publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management software (DRM) applied.
author: Kali Wallace
